text: The 1932 Winter Olympics, officially known as the III Olympic Winter Games, were held in 1932 in Lake Placid, New York, United States. The games started on February 4 1932. The 1932 Winter Olympic Games were going to be in Big Pines, California, but because of poor snow conditions, the games were moved to Lake Placid. == Other websites == * IOC page for the 1932 Winter Olympics Olympics Category:1932 in the United States Category:1930s in New York (state) Category:Lake Placid, New York Winter Olympics 1932 Winter Olympics 1932
title: 1932 Winter Olympics
